name: Grammarly AI
about: An intelligent writing assistant that improves grammar, tone, and clarity using AI feedback.
summary: Polish your writing with AI-powered grammar and tone suggestions.
details: Grammarly AI refines your writing in real time, offering corrections, tone adjustments, and suggestions to enhance clarity and professionalism.
howTo: Install Grammarly in your browser or as a desktop app.
Write or paste your text into the editor.
Review AI-suggested edits for grammar, clarity, and tone.
Apply recommendations to finalize your text.
